name: Bat Trang ceramic village discovery tour
description: Bat Trang village, which is located on Red river’s bank – about 13km from Hanoi centre, has been an important ceramic center of Vietnam for centuries. During the trip, you will observe different procedures making ceramic objects (industrial scale and hand-made products); visit Bat Trang ceramic village and many galleries. Also, you will be introduced to ancient architectures – narrow lanes, Bat Trang Temple, French - style house.
